resources.string:
My name is Aleks.
 I was born in Antalya at the 22th of january in 1991.

 I ve completed my primary and elementary education at Maresal Musatafa Kemal primary school.

 And now Im studying at Selcuklu Anatolian Teacher Highschool.
 I have a simple family which has 5 people.

 My fathers name is Bora , my mothers name is GÃ¼l and my brothers (sisters) names are Hakan and Ege.

 My father is an accounter. And my mother is a teacher. Im the oldest one in my brothers.
